item.title: 3D-print your brain
item.description: 1 My little brain 2 Print your brain step-by-step 2.1 Scan your brain 2.2 Reconstruct brain surfaces 2.3 Convert and edit the surfaces 2.4 Refine the brain model and print it 3 Other related tutorials 1 My little brain In this National Day holiday, I made a 3D model of my brain and found a company on Taobao to 3D-print it. The finished product is about 10cm × 9cm × 6.
